author: mor
msg: Added a new status (Returned) on non-serialized inventory item. This way we can run a inventory report (Facility > Reports) in the system to get the count of the inventory items

author: crossley
msg: Deployment plugins descriptor file plugins.xml (deployed by 'deploy-plugins.xml' target of plugin build script)

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-4676: NullPointerException on SELECT on INNER JOIN
Check whether the page is latched after waiting for a lock, and assume
that the row has been deleted if it is not latched.

author: oching
msg: [MRM-1362] Add simple 'CRUD' pages for project-level metadata along with a "generic metadata" plugin
o allow only users with repo manager role to add & delete metadata content
o add archiva-add-metadata and archive-delete-metadata permissions
